title: Update Byte Buddy to work with Java 21 on Quarkus LTS version

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

Backport to Quarkus LTS the fix made for Quarkus 3.4 in [PR #35617 ](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/35617)

### Expected behavior

The server starts as in Quarkus 3.4

### Actual behavior

The server throw the error:
`Java 21 (65) is not supported by the current version of Byte Buddy which officially supports Java 20 (64) - update Byte Buddy or set net.bytebuddy.experimental as a VM property`

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

graalvm-jdk-21+35.1

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus 3.2.6.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
